publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8004 Jim Hume: Galashiels Town Band—That the Parliament acknowledges what it sees as the hard work of the Galashiels Town Band; further acknowledges what is considered to be the excellent entertainment provided by the band for the people of Galashiels since 1834; also congratulates Galashiels Town Band on its fundraising campaign and wishes it well in further fundraising, and recognises the importance of such bands to local communities.

S3M-8004 Jim Hume: Galashiels Town Band—That the Parliament acknowledges what it sees as the hard work of the Galashiels Town Band; further acknowledges what is considered to be the excellent entertainment provided by the band for the people of Galashiels since 1834; also congratulates Galashiels Town Band on its fundraising campaign and wishes it well in further fundraising, and recognises the importance of such bands to local communities.
S3M-8004 Galashiels Town Band (lodged on 24 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-8004 Jim Hume: Galashiels Town Band—That the Parliament acknowledges what it sees as the hard work of the Galashiels Town Band; further acknowledges what is considered to be the excellent entertainment provided by the band for the people of Galashiels since 1834; also congratulates Galashiels Town Band on its fundraising campaign and wishes it well in further fundraising, and recognises the importance of such bands to local communities. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
